title: --local is no longer required for docker_switches
body:
Requiring the use of `floki --local` when using `docker_switches` doesn't dissuade floki file authors from using `docker_switches`, but it is a minor annoyance to users of those floki files.

With this PR the --local flag is no longer required. floki doesn't error when the flag is passed, it writes a warning to stderr in that case. We can drop support entirely in a future release.

title: Bump serde_yaml from 0.8.4 to 0.8.11

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [serde_yaml](https://github.com/dtolnay/serde-yaml) from 0.8.4 to 0.8.11.
Release notes

Sourced from serde_yaml's releases.

0.8.11

  • Add seeded versions of deserialize functions (#135, thanks @toasteater)

0.8.10

  • Implement PartialEq for Value == u64, Value == bool (#138, #139, thanks @CAD97)

0.8.9

  • Add Value::get_mut to index into a &mut Value, returning Option

0.8.8

  • Provide an implementation of Default for serde_yaml::Value which produces Value::Null (#120, thanks @macisamuele)

0.8.7

  • Allow YAML tags to be used to specify an enum variant (#115, thanks @EliSnow)

0.8.6

  • 128-bit integer support (#110)

0.8.5

  • Support integers represented in binary, e.g. 0b0101 (#106, thanks @p4l1ly)
Commits
  • db27fa7 Release 0.8.11
  • 57a7509 Drop version-sync dependency
  • a4b1085 Replace 'impl private' pattern with pub(crate)
  • 862c8cd Clarify seed module
  • 4e6f1eb Forward deserialize functions to deserialize with seed functions
  • 96385b7 Remove ```edition2018 from doc tests
  • b7ff08f Raise minimum supported compiler version to 1.31
  • c791001 Update to 2018 edition
  • 14ea96f Merge pull request #135 from toasteater/feature/de-seed
  • 6c2a10f Release 0.8.10
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=serde_yaml&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.8.4&new-version=0.8.11)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score/?dependency-name=serde_yaml&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.8.4&new-version=0.8.11) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself.
